entry.title: one single glimpse of relief
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,678Chapters: 6/20Kudos: 82

Summary: "What if I never get better? What if I always feel like this?" Buck finally looks back up at him, vulnerability and compassion clear on his too-expressive face. "I don't know," he says honestly. "I don't…" he shudders, gives a tiny shrug of his shoulders and tries again. "I don't have an answer for that, man. It's been seven months for me and I still feel…like this." "Like what?" Buck just shrugs again, then mumbles, "Not myself." And Eddie doesn't know what to say to that either, because this is the only version of Buck he's ever known.Or: Buck and Eddie meet at grief group.

entry.title: Brother, I watched the sky burn
entry.summary:
Author: TentativeTreason

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,879Chapters: 6/7Kudos: 1,724

Summary: The 118 finally learn why Buck is the way he is. Their theory of a cult or a conversion camp was way off. Somehow, though, the reality of being a demi-god isn’t much better. Buck thought they’d be happier to learn he wasn’t part of a cult. **** (i.e. The 118 all struggle with the revelation in different ways. Bobby crashes out learning the Gods exist, Athena’s still wanting justice for Buck’s dead childhood and if Eddie was worried about Anna being a nun, he has no idea how to cope with the literal son of a deity.) **** Part of a series Hearth and Home, Buck is a demi-god, blessed by Hestia.

entry.title: Might say something stupid
entry.summary:
Author: Whatdawnknows

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,449Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 110

Summary: “If you say ‘chain of command’ one more time…” “Or else what?” Eddie cringed every time he played it back in his head. Which he couldn’t stop doing. Why did he say that out loud? It didn’t even make any sense! But the truth was, the conversation had already been a few steps ahead in Eddie’s mind when that phrase popped out of his mouth. He would raise an eyebrow, look Buck in the eye with a challenge, a dare, and repeat it. Slowly. Clearly. “Chain. Of. Command.”

entry.title: Far too little too late
entry.summary:
Author: Reese667

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,422Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 1,340

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley fought for his family. He fought to get back to them and now that he’s back his family won’t even look at him without disdain anymore. Buck had dropped the lawsuit and his family won’t forgive him for suing them. Originally Buck thought it’d blow over but after 2 months he’s lost hope for things going back to normal. Then his call back to action from the Navy comes and he doesn’t fight it.Aka: Buck is tired of fighting for the family that no longer wants him. Its set during the post Lawsuit era and its a story about of Buck was a Naval aviator and he gets called back for the suicide mission from Top Gun: Maverick.

entry.title: right in front of you
entry.summary:
Author: kryptonian

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,096Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 304

Summary: Eddie is there. Eddie, in his stupid grey-ish purple tank and tiny, tiny shorts. He’s grinning, sweat beading across his brow and glistening down his cheeks. He lifts a hand, tapping his ear, and mouths, ‘take it out.’ That’s fine. Eddie wants to talk to him. Buck loves it when Eddie talks to him. He’s great at eye contact. Eddie’s got great eyes, too. Buck could look at them for hours.  He presses pause on the machine, and it slows to a stop, fingers plucking the headphone out of his ear. “What’s up?” “Why were your eyes closed?” Eddie asks, amusement dancing around his words. He doesn’t have a good answer for that. “Uh—I was focusing.” “Uh-huh, you looked very focused. Also kind of constipated.” “Thank you, Eddie,” he huffs, grabbing his small towel from the handle and wiping his face off. “Did you need something? Or are you just here to heckle my workout?” Eddie laughs, shaking his head fondly before jerking his head to gesture to where he’d just been lifting weights. “You mind spotting me? I can do you after.” I can do you after. Jesus Christ.Or: How Eddie Diaz's perfect thighs ruined Buck's workout.

entry.title: no one wants to hear you sing about tragedy
entry.summary:
Author: humandevolution

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,618Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 184

Summary: 9x08 Coda - Maybe Eddie isn't so chill and cool all the time after all. Maybe he's obsessive. Maybe he's the one who makes everything about Buck and not the other way around. + "Would you have fired Buck? Honestly? Buck?" Eddie stares back at Ravi, speechless. Then, he says, "I...well...there's a reason I'm not Captain." Ravi shrugs, turning towards the locker room. "I just think it's interesting that you would fire your new work best friend, but you wouldn't be able to fire your old life best friend." And Eddie frowns. "He's not my old best friend." "Could've fooled me."

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,608Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 41
